title: Need help if this laptop can run League
body:
Hello!
I will be buying a new laptop and was wondering if it can run League on medium settings or higher.
I do not know much about the specs so please tell me if it can run smoothly on around 50~60 fps on medium or higher settings.
The specs are Intel® Quad Core™ i7-2670QM Processor (6M Cache, up to 3.10 GHz)
8Gb Ram and NVIDIA® GeForce GT 540M w/Optimus 2GB
Thank you so much!!

replies.body: Looks good enough to run league on 60+ fps with Medium+ settings
